word_mean: 昆虫学：动物学中专事昆虫研究的分支学科

sentence.Network_en: He decided to specialize in entomology after graduation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他决定毕业后专攻昆虫学.

sentence.Network_en: Research opportunities exist in a wide range of pure and applied areas of entomology.
sentence.Network_cn: 纯理论昆虫学和应用昆虫学的众多领域都存在着研究机会。

sentence.Network_en: The study of plant resistance to insects dates back to earliest days of applied entomology.
sentence.Network_cn: 早在应用昆虫学发展的初期,就已开始植物抗虫性的研究.

applied ecology 应用生态学applied entomology 应用昆虫学applied microbiology 应用微生物学
昆虫生态学(Insect ecology) 研究昆虫与环境相互关系的学科。 农业昆虫学(Agricultural entomology) 研究与农业有关的昆虫的发生规律、控制和利用的原理和方法的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French entomologie or modern Latin entomologia, from Greek entomon (denoting an insect) + -logia (see -logy)

entry.def: Entomology is the study of insects.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of zoology that studies insects
